verbs.description: [ARG1: religious leaders] [V: gather] [ARGM-LOC: in dearborn] condemn pittsburgh synagogue mass murders in a showing of unity and support leaders of several faiths gathered in dearborn thursday to condemn the synagogue mass murders and to pray for peace and tolerance robert bowers pittsburgh dearborn michigan rev robert schoenhals mich first united methodist church of ferndale imam mohammad ali elahi islamic house of wisdom dearborn synagogue pittsburgh synagogue tree of life synagogue rabbi nate degroot tree of life
